titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-765, by Mr. Sessions.
The resolution provides that suspensions will be in order at any time on the legislative day of Friday, October 8, 2004.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 247.

bill.summary: 10/8/2004--Reported to House without amendment. Makes it in order at any time on October 8, 2004, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
